item.text: @#/ /'bum cha pa bzhugs so//
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ bam po brgya
so gcig pa/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi
pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod
do| |phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam
pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las
'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid
yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos
po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul
gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i
lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa
rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis
gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa
med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi
sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par
rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang
byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams
yod do| |lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs
rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams
yod do| |kau shi ka/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la
las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji
snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang
ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang /
bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi phal rol tu phyin pa 'di
las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug
par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob
par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob
bo| |'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos
de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang

chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa

nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa

stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par sbong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang
po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams
cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/
rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton
du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs
che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtsho ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /
'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor
gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i
lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams
yod do| |chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin
tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye
mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /
tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol

rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod

do| |'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/
rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo
nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags
pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /
mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting
nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying
rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
yod do| |dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /
lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma
snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/
mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i
glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /
'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par
gyur to| |thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang
byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas
so| |mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes

rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /

'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong

pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam
par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin
gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dris pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje
chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/
de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher
bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal
chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod
do| |gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /
tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya
nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /
cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /

nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong
pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin
stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid
stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu
'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /
'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa
brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes
pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag
par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'od pa'i 'bras bu yod
do| |phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du
zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug
pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/
bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar
shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par
gyur to| |'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang
chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol

tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas

stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid
dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med

pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgro stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang /
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams
cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod
do| |rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i
lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams
yod do| |tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod
do| |dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i
lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams
yod do| |gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams
yod do| |cung zad mang pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha
rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do//

nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam ba stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa
nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong
pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa
nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag ba rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi
rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i
bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar
gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /
ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
yod do| |snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi
'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs
pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems
dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ kau shi ka/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel
lam| gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i
phyir zhe na/ kau sha ki/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu
mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /
dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa lha rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang
chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos
de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid
dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa

stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos

po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang /
dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis
gnas ba'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /
gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad
dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/
rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang /
kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ /de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol
tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi
rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams
yod do| |'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun
snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha
rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod
do| |shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes
mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa
nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med
pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po
med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang
dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yod do/ /'phags pa'i lam
yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams
yod do| |rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
yod do| |mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams yod do/ /mi 'jigs pa rnams
yod do| |so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan
gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs
rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi
ka/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa
bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod
nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi
bu'am| rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel
lo| |de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/ de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ 'thob
par 'gyur ro/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom
pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis rang byang chub thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa'
sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ /'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon
par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos de dag
kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /
chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong

pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po

med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi
dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad
dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par shes pa drug dang / ting nge
'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi
chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med pa gzhan dag
kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam du
bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi
ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing
mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha
rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs
lha nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do//
tshad med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /
dge rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams
yod do| |mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam

gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /
chen po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha
ma med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mchan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
yod do| |'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i
snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan
ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
yod do| |mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam par
shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra bcom
pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams yod do/ /kau shi ka/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las bsam
gtan bzhi la bkod de/ tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la rab tu bkod na/ kau shi ka/ de ji snyam du sems/ rigs
kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams de'i rgyus mang du 'phel lam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ mang ngo / /bde bar gshegs pa/ mang ngo / /bcom ldan 'das kyis
bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ de bas rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i glegs bam bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan
la byin na/ bsod nams ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/ de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bas zag pa med pa'i chos rnams rgya cher bstan te/
de dag la bslab cing rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dag yang dag pa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go/ 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras
bu thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /dgra bcom pa nyid thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa rnams kyis rang byang chub
thob par gyur to/ /thob bo/ /'thob par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs par gyur to/ /'jug go /
'jug par 'gyur ro/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ zag pa med pa'i chos de dag kyang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol

tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / phyi

nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa

stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /
mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag
par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden
pa bzhi dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang / mngon par
shes pa drug dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi
dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen po dag ste/ sangs rgyas kyi chos tshad med
pa gzhan dag kyang rgya cher bstan to/ /kau shi ka/ rnam grangs des kyang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa glegs bam
du bris shing bklag pa dang / bri ba dang / kha ton du bya ba'i phyir gzhan la byin na/ de bas 'di'i bsod nams ches mang du 'phel bar shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ kau shi ka/
de ni/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di las chos thams cad rgya cher bstan te/ de dag yod pas rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba rnams yod do/ /bram ze'i rigs che zhing
mtho ba rnams yod do/ /khyim bdag gi rigs che zhing mtho rnams yod do/ /rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams yod do/ /mtshe ma'i lha
rnams yod do/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /'phrul dga'i lha rnams yod do/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs lha
nye phan gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lha rnams yod do/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams yod do/ /snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung snang gi lha rnams yod do/ /tshad
med snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung dge'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /dge
rgyas kyi lha rnams yod do/ /che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /chung che'i lha rnams yod do/ /tshad med che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /mi che ba'i lha rnams yod
do| |mi gdung ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams yod do/ /'og min gyi lha rnams yod do/ /nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched
kyi lha rnams yod do/ /rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams yod do/ /'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha
rnams yod do/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu pa yod do/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /bsam gtan

gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yod do/ /nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi stong pa nyid yod do/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid yod do/ /stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /chen
po stong pa nyid yod do/ /don dam pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yod do/ /mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /thog ma dang tha ma
med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang bzhin stong pa nyid yod do/ /chos thams cad stong pa nyid yod do/ /rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yod do/ /ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yod do/ /dran pa nye bar
gzhag pa rnams yod do/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams yod do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yod do/ /dbang po rnams yod do/ /stobs rnams yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag rnams
yod do| |'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yod do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yod do/ /bsam gtan rnams yod do/ /tshad med pa rnams yod do/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa rnams yod do/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad yod do/ /mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yod do/ /rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma
med pa dang / smon pa med pa yod do/ /mngon par shes pa rnams yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams yod do/ /gzungs kyi sgo rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams
yod do| |mi 'jigs pa rnams yod do/ /so so yang dag par rigs pa rnams yod do/ /snying rje chen po yod do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs
pa'i 'bras bu yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu yod do/ /dgra bcom pa nyid yod do/ /rang byang chub yod do/ /lam gyi rnam pa
shes pa nyid yod do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yod do/ /rgyun du zhugs pa rnams yod do/ /lan gcig phyir 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba rnams yod do/ /dgra
bcom pa rnams yod do/ /rang sangs rgyas rnams yod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yod do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
rgyas rnams yod do// //shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa/ /bam po brgya so gnyis pa/ kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo
gang la las shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed na/ de'i bsod nams ches mang du
'phel gyi/ dzam+bu'i gling gi sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang /
bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /stong gi 'jig rten gyi
khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms
par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /stong gnyis kyi 'jigs rten gyi khams 'bring po'i sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam
la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /stong
gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la bkod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzugs
med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lnga la bkod pas ni/ ma yin no/ /de la tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa ni/ 'di yin te/ gnyis la spyod pa'ang
ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byad pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du
yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang /
'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin
pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
blos bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis
pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / tshul bzhin
du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos nang stong pa nyid 'dzin pa dang / kun chub par byed pa dang / 'chang ba dang / klog
pa dang / tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos phyi stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos phyi nang stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang
ma yin| mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos stong pa nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyad pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang
ma yin pa'i blos chen po stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos don dam pa stong pa nyid
tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos 'dus byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis
pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
blos thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dor ba med pa stong pa
nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rang bzhin stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos chos thams cad stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mi dmigs
pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dngos po med pa stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /
gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos
dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos yang dag par spong ba rnams tshul
bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams tshul bzhin
du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos dbang po rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma
yin| mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i
blos byang chub kyi yan lag rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos 'phags pa'i lam yan
lag brgyad pa tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams tshul bzhin du
yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos bsam gtan rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma
yin| mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos tshad med pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin
pa'i blos gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rnam par thar
pa brgyad tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu tshul bzhin
du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa
tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mngon par shes pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis
la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos ting nge 'dzin rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la
spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos gzungs kyi sgo rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos de bzhin gshegs
pa'i stobs rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos mi 'jigs pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la
byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos so so yang dag par rig pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la
byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos snying rje chen po tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi
gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod
pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos thams cad shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos lam gyi
rnam pa shes pa nyid tshul bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /gnyis la spyod pa'ang ma yin/ mi gnyis pa la spyod pa'ang ma yin pa'i blos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid tshul
bzhin du yid la byed pa'o/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rnam grangs du mar rgya cher
rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston cing de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na/ kau shi ka/ de la shes
rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni/ 'di yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni/ gnyis su lta ba ma yin/ gnyis su med par lta ba ma yin/ mtshan mar ma yin/ mtshan ma
med par ma yin/ blang bar ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ dbri bar ma yin/ bsnan par ma yin/ kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/ rnam par byang bar ma yin/ skye bar ma yin/
'gag par ma yin/ gzung bar ma yin/ mi gzung bar ma yin/ len par ma yin/ dor bar ma yin/ gnas bar ma yin/ mi gnas par ma yin/ yang dag par ma yin/
log par ma yin/ ldan par ma yin/ mi ldan par ma yin/ 'dre bar ma yin/ mi 'dre bar ma yin/ rkyen du ma yin/ rkyen med par ma yin/ chos su ma yin/ chos ma
yin par ma yin/ de bzhin nyid du ma yin/ de bzhin nyid ma yin par ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin/ yang dag pa'i mtha' ma yin par ma yin te/ rigs kyi bu'am/
rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing 'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par
byed cing / de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na/ bsod nams mang du 'phel gyi/ bdag 'ba' zhig gis bzung ba'am/ kun chub par byas pa'am/ bcangs pa'am/
bklags pa'am/ tshul bzhin du yid la byas pas ni/ ma yin no/ /kau shi ka/ gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bdag
nyid kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dzin cing kun chub par byed de/ 'chang zhing klog la tshul bzhin du yid la byed cing / de gzhan la'ang rgya cher rjod cing ston la 'chad cing
'grel pa dang / rnam par 'byed cing gsal bar byed la yang dag par ston par byed cing / de'i don gtan la dbab par ston par byed na/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi
bu mo de'i bsod nams ni/ shin tu mang du 'phel lo/ /brgya byin gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de
ltar don dang ldan la yi ge dang ldan par bstan par bgyi'am/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mos shes rab kyi pha rol tu
phyin pa de ltar don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par bstan par byas te/ kau shi ka/ de ltar ston pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo ni/ bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med grangs
med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /kau shi ka/ gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam 'tsho'i bar du me tog dang / phreng ba dang / spos dang / byug pa dang / phye ma dang / na bza' dang / gdugs dang / rgyal mtshan dang / ba dan
dang | sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/
rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di gzhan la rgya cher don dang ldan/ yi ge dang ldan par rnam grangs du mar brjod de bstan pa dang /
bshad de bkrol zhing / rnam par phye ste gsal ba dang / yang dag par bstan pa byas na/ rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo de'i bsod nams 'di ni/ ches mang du 'phel lo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe
na| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis
bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/ /kau shi
ka| gal te rigs kyi bu'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med grangs med pa dag la nam

rnam pa sna tshogs dang / bde pa'i yo byad thams cad kyis rim gror byas pa dang / bkur stir byas pa dang / phu dud du byas pa dang / mchod pa byas pa bas/ kau shi ka/ rigs kyi

zhe na| shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di la bslab ste 'das pa dang / ma byon pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
